import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./sidebar.css"; const Sidebar = () => { const [cats, setCats] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchCats = async () => { const res = await axios.get('/categories') setCats(res.data) } fetchCats() }, []) return (
